TopicTitle: [Kopernicus] How do you move the KSC up and down?

Articles.Content:
I know how to move the terrain up and down (thanks @OhioBob), but how do you move the KSC? I want to lower the KSC into the water, which is now above the ground. Just knowing how to move it up and down should be enough, but I need examples 'cuz I'm kinda dumb

Also, I might not be able to respond or test things right away because I'm home sick and my dad doesn't let me use electronics when I'm sick
